Reviews.Title: “Such a clean hotel in a great location”
Reviews.Author: Jennamac
Reviews.Content: recently travelled berlin couple city break hotel 4 youth perfect affordable choice accommodation base exploring city day night hotel brand kept spotlessly clean warm double bathroom bath power shower lots hot water windows bar bustling atmosphere night nights underground 3 stops centre east berlin spent break centre taxis easy night cost 8 euros hotel streets 2 minute walk hotel amazing little bars restaurants continental breakfast especially baskets freshly baked rolls definately stay return berlin clean location nice mix people couples families children
